metadata.title: CVE-2019-13631 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In parse_hid_report_descriptor in drivers/input/tablet/gtco.c in the Linuxkernel through 5.2.1, a malicious USB device can send an HID report thattriggers an out-of-bounds write during generation of debugging messages.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
